summary: quinoxaline 1,4-di-N-oxides (QdNOs) were known as potent antibacterial agents. cyadox, mequindox, quinocetone and their metabolites were submitted to the in vitro evaluation for antituberculosis, antimycoplasma, antifungal and antiviral activities. study gives new insight in further application of QdNOs. electronic supplementary material available to authorized users.
